package.name: Beamngain_Logdownload
package.summary: This plugin allows you to download the log file generated by magento default.
package.description: This plugin allows you to download the log file generated by magento i,e at following path : app/var/log/. Generally in magento application it become hard to debug the issue which is related to system, exception or general PHP error. This extension allow you to download file other than log file like system and exception file. You only need to specify the correct file name.
package.notes: This plugin allows you to download the log file generated by magento i,e at following path : app/var/log/. Generally in magento application it become hard to debug the issue which is related to system, exception or general PHP error. This extension allow you to download file other than log file like system and exception file. You only need to specify the correct file name.
